game

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Consumable, Ghost, Waka, Wall

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    General purpose object superclass of all objects in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      processing.core.PImage sprite
      The PImage sprite of the object.
      int x
      The x coordinate of the object.
      int xSpawn
      The initial x coordinate of the object at instantiation.
      int y
      The y coordinate of the object.
      int ySpawn
      The initial y coordinate of the object at instantiation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameObject(int x, int y, processing.core.PImage sprite)
      General superclass constructor which is called by all game objects to instantiate its most basic attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(App app)
      Draw the object using its sprite.
      int getCx(int offset)
      Finds the x coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current x position to the nearest multiple of 16.
      int getCy(int offset)
      Finds the y coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current y position to the nearest multiple of 16.
      boolean isCentre(int offset)
      Determines whether the given object is in the centre of a 16x16 cell.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draw the object using its sprite.
        Parameters:
        app - The App object

      • getCx

        public int getCx(int offset)
        Finds the x coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current x position to the nearest multiple of 16.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset value of the object to when drawing the sprite (applies to ghost and Waka)
        Returns:
        The x coordinate of the closest cell

      • getCy

        public int getCy(int offset)
        Finds the y coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current y position to the nearest multiple of 16.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset value of the object to when drawing the sprite (applies to ghost and Waka)
        Returns:
        The y coordinate of the closest cell

      • isCentre

        public boolean isCentre(int offset)
        Determines whether the given object is in the centre of a 16x16 cell.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset value of the object to when drawing the sprite (applies to ghost and Waka)
        Returns:
        Whether the cell is at the centre or not
